string.text: Hold this key to hide the item tooltip
Use this key to toggle between modes
Toggle tooltip visibility mode: - ON: Tooltip is hidden by default, shown only when holding the Hide Tooltip Key. - OFF: Tooltip is shown by default, hidden when holding the Hide Tooltip Key.
Sets the delay (in milliseconds) before the tooltip appears. If set to 0, tooltips will appear instantly.

If enabled, the tooltip will be displayed when clicking the mouse, even if the hide mode is active. This is useful if you want to temporarily view the tooltip without completely disabling the hide mode.
